Processes.Description: A transporter mediated unidirectional transfer of a compound across a cellular membrane is described as saturable process following Michaelis-Menten type kinetics. The corresponding kcat value is calculated from a specific Vmax as input value.

Compounds.Name: R-Norverapamil

Processes.Description: A transporter mediated unidirectional transfer of a compound across a cellular membrane is described as saturable process following Michaelis-Menten type kinetics. The corresponding kcat value is calculated from a specific Vmax normalized to the amount of transporter as input value which was determined in a vesicular transport assay.

CalculationMethods: Cellular partition coefficient method - Rodgers and Rowland
